text: Nándor Hidegkuti (3 March 1922 – 14 February 2002) was a Hungarian football player and manager. He played as a forward or attacking midfielder and mostly played for MTK Hungária FC. Hidegkuti died on 14 February 2002 after suffering from heart and lung problems for some time before his death.
